comment: DR. COOLICKS IS A WONDERFUL TEACHER. SHE VERY PASSIONATE ABOUT HER STUDENTS AND WANTS THEM TO LEARN. DONT EXPECT HER TO GIVE HER YOU A GRADE, IT MUST BE EARNED. IF YOU WANT TO LEARN TAKE HER...
Good teacher,  very passionate about teaching her culture class. Text book is a must!
You better read the book prior to class.  She will expect that you will be able to apply the info in the book, not just spit back what you've memorized.
